aboutMe.title: About TangMo
aboutMe.imageAlt: Placeholder drawing of TangMo dog nibbling on a watermelon
aboutMe.para: Hello! I’m a wolf from Thailand, living far from home. The name, TangMo, literally translates to “watermelon”. I’d be happy to chat about stuff from tech, photography, to daily dose of furry memes. Being “relatively” new to the fandom, it’s nice to meet everyone.

aboutChara.title: About the character
aboutChara.para: I just finished putting colors on a template reference sheet; haven't made a proper one. But you can take a look at this one now! Other images on this site are older placeholder doodle that hasn't been updated.

booking.title: Book My Body!
booking.intro: Want to play with me? Perhaps in private? Request booking here!
booking.form_info: What do you want to do to me uwu?
booking.form_notice: Once you submit the form, I will review the request and send you quotation on Telegram.

result.title: Err…
result.content: You might have taken the joke too seriously. But if you are really bored, you feel free to come {link}.
